articles.content: Monday marked the first time a new nuclear reactor has begun delivering power to the electric grid in the United States in nearly seven years. Nuclear energy does not generate the greenhouse gas emis… [+3438 chars]

articles.author: Matt Shuham
articles.title: Elon Musk Accused Of Intimidation For Threatening An Anti-Hate Speech Group - HuffPost
articles.description: The Center for Countering Digital Hate got a “ridiculous” legal threat from Twitter after publishing a report on Twitter’s lacking hate speech enforcement.
articles.content:
An anti-hate speech group is fighting back after Twitter threatened legal action over a study that found the company failed to remove hateful tweets from paid accounts. 
The legal threat from Twitte… [+3930 chars]
